cab.content: ! nocL3;n?.'?t ?s the Property ofJ;;;.:.".....' ... . . /-.' -vemrrsentt"''"v"*-.'^Z^^iw2 ****** . . ..... . ,...f ;iVt'wuM4hK/UIMWW*M'Milit^y^Secret. 1325From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,13th March 1920.3412. No. 170.Part I. (1) Mahsuds are collecting for a further Jirga at Kanigurara on 12th.(2) Reference to para. 5 of Serial No. 169. Afghan reinforcements of 2 squadrons of cavalry, a detachment of infantry and some irregulars arrived at Karatapa on 28th February, and 400 infantry reported arrived at Sar-i-Pul, on 7th March, fronfi Herat. 'Part II. (3) Tochi movable column captured 38 camels on the 10th attempting to run blockade.(4) Derajat column. Nothing to report.Para. 2 not given to Press.
